objects.description:
Prerequisite:  
1. Enable Pinning the Web on Settings > Developer
objects.name: [Pin the Web]If a "scope" is provided in an app manifest then all pages with URLs within that scope are considered "pinned" once the site has been pinned

steps.expected: New pinned icon shows
steps.instruction: Close current window and go to homescreen
Tap browser icon to open a new window, and navigate to http://alison-shiue.github.io/without\_manifest/icon\_1.html which is not in scope

steps.expected: Should open another window which start page is http://alison-shiue.github.io/with\_manifest/start\_url.html
steps.instruction: Go back to homescreen and tap the pinned icon

objects.description:
Verify that all strings are translated into the locale you are testing. 
If you find an untranslated string, look at the same string in a pseudolocale (preferably Accented English).
If the string appears in  normal English, it is hard-coded and not localizable.
File a bug under the "Firefox OS" component and add the keyword "l12y".
If the string appears in a pseudolocale, then the localizer hasn't got to it yet. Please don't file a bug.
objects.name: All of the strings on the date picker page are translated correctly without truncation

steps.instruction: Launch Calendar app.
Tap "+" icon to add a event.

steps.expected: There is no truncation. Nothing overlaps. The UI should not appear broken in any way. (Date format please refer to the link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Date_format_by_country)
steps.instruction: Tap the start/end date to enter date picker page.

objects.description:
Verify that all strings are translated into the locale you are testing. 
If you find an untranslated string, look at the same string in a pseudolocale (preferably Accented English).
If the string appears in  normal English, it is hard-coded and not localizable.
File a bug under the "Firefox OS" component and add the keyword "l12y".
If the string appears in a pseudolocale, then the localizer hasn't got to it yet. Please don't file a bug.
objects.name: All the strings on the time picker page are translated correctly without truncation.

steps.instruction: Launch Calendar app.
Tap "+" icon to add a event.

steps.expected: The order of time from left to right is: Hour-> hourMinutesSeparator(:)-> Minute -> Dayperiod(AM/PM) and there is no truncation. Nothing overlaps. The UI should not appear broken in any way.
steps.instruction: Tap the start/end time to enter time picker page.

objects.description:
Launch built-in apps will trigger performance marks, check the metric information be logged & payload be sent to test server include correct keyedHistograms.
1. Please follow-up the https://goo.gl/w0Kq3Y to setup test server & device
 - Setting up Test Server steps
 - Install needed tools
 - Set up apache rewrite for HTTP POST request
 - Enabling Advanced Telemetry in Device
objects.name: Launch built-in apps will trigger performance marks

steps.instruction: Setup test server, "Setting up Test Server steps" in https://goo.gl/w0Kq3Y
Setup device, "Enabling Advanced Telemetry in Device" in https://goo.gl/w0Kq3Y

Navigate to Settings > Developer > Developer HUD >
    Enable Developer Tools checkbox. 
    Enable Telemetry checkbox.
    Enable Warnings, Errors, and Security issues checkbox in Problems
    Enable Reflows and Jank checkbox in Performance.
    Enable Unique Set Size checkbox in Memory

Open Terminal, check logs:
    adb logcat | grep -i -E 'advancedtelemetry|gallery|video|developerhud'

steps.expected:
DEVTOOLS_HUD_REFLOW_DURATION xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_REFLOWS xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_VISUALLYLOADED xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_CONTENTINTERACTIVE xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_MEDIAENUMERATED xxxx gallery   
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_FULLYLOADED xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_VISUALLYLOADED xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_CONTENTINTERACTIVE xxxx gallery 
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_MEDIAENUMERATED xxxx gallery
DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_FULLYLOADED xxxx gallery
steps.instruction: Open Gallery app and check if the logs contains

steps.expected:
DEVTOOLS_HUD_REFLOW_DURATION xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_REFLOWS xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_VISUALLYLOADED xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_SCANEND xxxx video   
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_FULLYLOADED xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_NAVIGATIONLOADED xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_STARTUP_TIME_NAVIGATIONINTERACTIVE xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_VISUALLYLOADED xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_CONTENTINTERACTIVE xxxx video 
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_SCANEND xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_FULLYLOADED xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_NAVIGATIONLOADED xxxx video
 DEVTOOLS_HUD_APP_MEMORY_NAVIGATIONINTERACTIVE xxxx video
steps.instruction: Open Video app and check if the logs contains
Check if the payload is sent when the report interval is reached

objects.description:
General UX Specs: https://mozilla.app.box.com/s/y60s1ngyza9jcltmpaqwfoye4f311n5r    
Precondition: Firefox account has been logged in.
objects.name: [Marketplace]The Recommended Apps view should display correctly in RTL

steps.instruction: Set your phone language to Arabic.
Launch Marketplace.
Tap "More" tab.

steps.expected:
4.1.The header title should be center-aligned and read right to left, the back button should be right-aligned and mirrored.    
4.2.The layout buttons should be left-aligned but not be mirrored.    
4.3.The name, category, rate bar and install button should be right-aligned with any Arabic language reading right to left. The app icons should be left-aligned but not be mirrored.    
4.4.The scrollbar is now left-aligned, but still move vertically.    
4.5.Slide to the bottom of the view, text within "Load more" button should be center-aligned and read right to left, the load icon should be displayed at right side of text but not be mirrored.    
4.6.Nothing should overlap. The UI should not appear broken in any way.
steps.instruction: Select  "Recommended Apps".

objects.description: General UX Specs: https://mozilla.app.box.com/s/y60s1ngyza9jcltmpaqwfoye4f311n5r
objects.name: [Buddy up]The main view of Buddy up should display correctly in RTL

steps.instruction: Set your phone language to Arabic.

steps.expected:
2.1.The header title should be center-aligned and read right to left, the setting button should be left-aligned.    
2.2.In the "Have Questions?" area, the question mark icon should be the same as that in LTR language, the text should be center-aligned and reading right to left and the question mark should be mirrored but not be flipped, text within "Ask a Question" button should be center-aligned and read right to left.    
2.3.In the "Have Answers?" area, the bulb icon should be the same as that in LTR language, the text should be center-aligned and reading right to left and the question mark should be mirrored but not be flipped, text within "Answer Questions" button should be center-aligned and read right to left.    
2.4.Subtitles should be right-aligned and read right to left.    
2.5.The helpers sequence is reversed but the portrait should not be mirrored under "Top Helpers this week".    
2.6.If you didn't ask any question, "No questions" under "My Questions" should be right-aligned and read right to left.     
2.7.Nothing should overlap. The UI should not appear broken in any way.
steps.instruction: Launch Buddy up.

Navigate Settings|Improve Foxfood, and change the option to "Basic"
Return to Settings, nevigate Developer|Developer HUD. Verify if Developer Tools are disabled
